name: v1.0.0
body:
Initial v1.0.0 release for gmime3 support

## What's Changed
* Some Go Vet fixes by @vaskoz in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/9
* Test fixes by @vaskoz in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/10
* Gmime3 adding tests by @Dharmik-Patel in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/11
* Fixed gmime walk by @Dharmik-Patel in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/13
* Rework walk n parse by @Dharmik-Patel in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/14
* Adding function to check if part is attachment by @Dharmik-Patel in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/15
* Add filename function to part by @xdsxc in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/16
* checking if part is multipart before checking if its attachment by @Dharmik-Patel in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/17
* added a addHTMLPart to support plain text to html by @elan-sg in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/18
* fix nil pointer #patch by @Dharmik-Patel in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/19
* fixing memory leaks by @Dharmik-Patel in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/21
* mp-4752 remove header removes all headers by @elan-sg in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/20
* adding add address using internet address list methods by @elan-sg in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/22
* adding parse and append for addresses by @elan-sg in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/23
* attachment now returns true if it is an inline attachment by @elan-sg in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/24
* Add address list parsing and appending by @rhansen2 in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/25
* fixing memory leaks plus assertion errors from gmime by @Dharmik-Patel in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/27
* Add replace header function by @yuf3n9 in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/28
* Add function for getting full content-type with parameters. by @rhansen2 in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/29
* Add new func to header by @rhansen2 in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/30
* Add raw headers by @rhansen2 in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/31
* setup content-id function per mime part #patch by @davidblum in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/33
* add part string #patch by @ericychoi in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/34
* fix content id memory #patch by @ericychoi in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/35
* add content type param #minor by @ericychoi in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/36
* TPOT-4847: Cleanup things for v1.0.0 release by @xdsxc in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/38

## New Contributors
* @vaskoz made their first contribution in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/9
* @Dharmik-Patel made their first contribution in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/11
* @xdsxc made their first contribution in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/16
* @elan-sg made their first contribution in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/18
* @rhansen2 made their first contribution in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/25
* @yuf3n9 made their first contribution in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/28
* @davidblum made their first contribution in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/33
* @ericychoi made their first contribution in https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/pull/34

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sendgrid/go-gmime/commits/v1.0.0
